comments.text: I just stuck out my thumb here, and it got me to central Larnaca in a few minutes. :) Love the locals!

That round about connect Larnaca at the coast, Nicosia at the interior ,Larnaca Airport and Limassol at the west and Agia Napa at the east.

Just wait at the exit of the roundabout to get a lift probably  Limassol, some village on the way, or just the next roundabout of the airport. Is worthy, from there you can hitchike again.
 

To get there you can hitchhike from the city asking to take you out, never tried in Larnaca but in Nicosia works well. Or manage to arrive the closest bus stop 'Acropo

That round about connect Larnaca at the coast, Nicosia at the interior ,Larnaca Airport and Limassol at the west and Agia Napa at the east.

Just wait at the exit of the roundabout to get a lift probably direct to nicosia.
 

To get there you can hitchhike from the city asking to take you out, never tried in Larnaca but in Nicosia works well. Or manage to arrive the closest bus stop 'Acropoleos Avenue 1' numbers 417 ,454 409,415

That round about connect Larnaca at the coast, Nicosia at the interior ,Larnaca Airport and Limassol at the west and Agia Napa at the east.

The highway goes under the roundabout, so is hard tog et that kind of cars, but all cars which go through the roundabout will go more slowly. 

I sued mostly to go Agia Napa, never more than 10 minutes waiting. Is the entrance of the highway so go careful when walking. On that side of the road, at left after some big plants which hide the cars view, there i
There is place to stop at the start of the highway and cars don't go too fast.
perfect spot, lot of hitch-hikers there

This is a perfect spot in direction to Lefkosa/Nicosia. All cars passing this spot are going this direction. Easy to stop for the cars, there is also a bus stop. from the harbor you can walk to there in 15 min.
beautiful road, but no car but the first car stop
The "Balalan" effect haha. we waited here 1 hour on the sun. But only because tehre wasnt any car coming :-D:-D but than the first car stopped for us, so its a success!!!
just 5 min from dipkarpaz to yenierienkoy
try to hitchhike people who are on their way to the end of the island :-D We were lucky!

This is a Turkish military area, soldiers won't allow you to continue walking to St. Hilarion (because of "security reasons") so they will force you to hitchhike, and they will probably help you by stopping cars that go to the castle to ask if they can take you to the top.
just cross the border on foot and than the police at the tÃ¼rkish side will hitchhike for you the cars. :-D Even gave us water and food :-D amazing people!
It's a highway spot, but it has plenty of space on the side of it for cars to stop. A lot of traffic and drivers can see you from far. Got a ride to the city center of Pafos very quickly

Hitchhiking in Cyprus is extremely nice. Very good spot to leave Limassol in Pafos direction. It's after small fence. A lot of traffic and people turn to the highway so they go quite slow. There's space for cars to stop at the side of the road. Found a ride in a no time halfway to Pafos
Wait before the bus stop, plenty space to stop and plenty of drivers go either to nikosia or girne
Just cross the border by walk and hitchhike the cars passing by car, except the famagusta old town tour theres nothing here so it was wuite a dissappitment
Wanted to go to famagusta and got a ride up to the border in deryneia
Waited 5 mins, not many cars pass there though
A very good spot for both ways Polis/Pafos.
Walk past the "no pedestrian walking" sign. There's a space cars can stop ðŸ›‘. Better than standing in the traffic circle.
Common to stand at bus stops. Just stick out your thumb. North to Kyrenia (Girne). It's a straight shot.
first car stopped and took me into the city, even better: to the exact adress I wanted to go!!
Cars turning to Larnaca are going very slowly, you really have a good chance to hitch to Larnaca.  BUT there's no shade, no place to sit, so you're getting fried in the sun.

At the entrance of the highway direction to Larnaca in that case (cross the bridge for another direction). Just before the entrance there is a oil station but facing agia napa, and a bus stop and a lot of space to stop, but my experience is better when I hit my feet into the exit road. Cars from highway they are too fast but there is small chance to them to stop.   If you are in Agia Napa you can walk here, but Iit will take some time, you can hitchike around the road in any bus stop, it work fi

position  to Pafos side.
Better stay on the exit of town to highway after roundabout
From the city center, about 30-40min. There is a traffic light and it is quite easy to get a ride to the highway. There is light for hitching at night.
There is a bus stop. From here you can quite easily find a ride to the main road (not far from the big mall), and from there again reach the highway to any direction.
Lots of space for the cars to stop, and you can be lucky for a first ride that will bring you close to the highway to Limassol.
An easy way to go out of the city to reach GÃ¼zelyurt or Girne/Kyrenia. This is a bus stop where people can stop and bring you to the roundabound a few kilometers further.
The entrance of the highway that will bring you to Limassol/Larnaca. You can stay on the footpath just before the exit and cars have space enough to stop on the exit.
There is usually a lot of space for the cars to stop on the parking spaces on the roadside. It is a good place to be brought to the entrance of the highway to Limassol or Larnaca, or even further.
wait 1 hour from the monastir because there is very few car there
after a nice night at the golden beach we hitchhiked a tractor here! amazing experience! :-D
Best place to get a ride to Larnaca, Lemessos or Nicosia. Waited 10 minutes at early Sunday moorning.
Cars are often going to paphos. 2 persons hitchhiking, and a pickup with only 1 places free pickup us up. :-)
Not a perfect spot, but this is the only way from St. Hilarion junctino to Nicosia. There are place for cars to stop, but they are driving fast, so you must experiment with the exact location.

We stood just before the highway, behind the guard rail. Big sign saying no stopping / hitching. But... A car stopped before police we saw any police.
There are tunnels to get around the roundabout without playing Frogger in the road.
Hitch towards limmasol / larnaca / lefkosia (Nicosia)

The roundabout is hard for someone to stop in. They could, maybe, but it'd be dangerous and no one seemed to stop there. Also, not great luck at the gas station 6min walk from there.
If all else fails, the
After the roundabound, just when the highway starts, there is plenty of space for the cars to stop and they don't drive really fast. There is light for hitching at night.
The spot is walkable from the city center, but there is no space for the cars to stop. You might want to walk 15 more minutes until the first traffic lights. There is light at night in this spot.
waited more than 1 hour to get to the highway to nicosia. plus: I'd never go again alone as a girl. only perverts stopping!!!
